articles.author: Hanna Ziady, CNN Business
articles.title: Amazon spends another $500 million on bonuses. Some of its workers are still going on strike - CNN
articles.description: Amazon is spending another $500 million on bonuses for employees as it comes under pressure from a global campaign targeting its business practices and a strike in one of its biggest European markets.
